title: Eight people shot in Baltimore shooting
content:
BALTIMORE, Md. (WSAZ) -- Several people were shot in the Eastern District of Baltimore, Maryland Saturday night.
Police say at least eight people have been shot. All have non-life threatening injuries.
According to police, one of the shooting victims was only three years old.
According to Baltimore police, there are three suspects. The chief of media relations says one suspect had a shotgun and two had handguns.
According to the Baltimore Police Department's Twitter page, it happened in the area of Greenmount Avenue and Preston Street Saturday night.
Police have not released any of the victims conditions but says all of their injuries are non-life threatening.
We will keep you updated on this story.
